docs.title: What is Project Neptune?
docs.text: Project that aims to recover online services for Medal Of Honor 2010

docs.title: Frequently asked questions
docs.text:
1. Q: Should i use my EA account to log in?

    1. A: No, you need to create a new account in-game and use it to login in the future.

  2. Q: Why I am getting kicked from the server?

    1. A: At the moment the only reason you can get kicked from the server is that you don't have PunkBuster installed. Check PunkBuster⁠

  3. Q: When launching multiplayer I am receiving "Please update the game to the latest version!" error?

    1. A: Update multiplayer using Official EA Patch

  4. Q: I am stuck infinitely on "Trying to connect...." in-game?

    1. A: Restart the game, when you get a login error hit retry and re-enter your login credentials.

  5. Q: Is there a way to change field of view (FOV)?

    1. A: Yes, navigate to your Documents\EA Games\Medal of Honor\Multiplayer\settings.ini. Open it with notepad and change Fov to your preffered value.

  6. Q: Is there a possibility to host my own server?

    1. A: At the moment, no. Project Neptune is still in development

docs.title: How to play on PC
docs.text:
1. Download and install Medal of Honor from:

    1. EA app
    2. Steam (you can skip step 2)

  2. [EA App version only!] Update multiplayer via Official EA Patch. This is required because:

    1. The initial downloaded version does not have multiplayer updated.
    2. The updaters that go along with the game no longer will work.

  3. Install/Update PunkBuster PunkBuster

  4. Download Neptune Launcher from ⁠files-for-multiplayer

    1. You can save the launcher in these locations:
    2. Any arbitrary location (however if the launcher is unable to find the game, then choose other location below)
    3. Medal of Honor folder where MP\MoHMPGame.exe or Binaries\moh.exe exists
    4. Medal of Honor\MP folder where MoHMPGame.exe exists
    5. Medal of Honor\Binaries folder where moh.exe exists
    6. Run the launcher. It will download neccassary files for singleplayer and/or multiplayer.
      1. Install .NET Framework 4.7.2 if you are unable to run the launcher.
      2. If your antivirus complains about the launcher... Sorry, there is nothing we can do about it, we recommend adding it to exceptions.
    7. Launch singleplayer or multiplayer

  5. When logging in, do not use your existing EA account. You need to create a new account in-game.

Have fun!

docs.title: How to play on PS3
docs.text:
1. PRECONDITIONS:
    1. You need to have a PlayStation Network (PSN) account.
    2. You need to have an already created Project Neptune account that was created on PC
    3. The account must have at least 1 persona created. If the account will have 0 personas, then logging in will fail.
Note

This is temporary, an user registration site will be available in the future, you can also request new account by creating new support ticket in ⁠Support

  1. KNOWN ISSUES:
    • Vehicle aim sensitivity is broken for PS3 players
    • Playgroups are not supported at the moment
Note

If you will be intending to play other EA games (for example, Battlefield) on your PS3, then you may not be able to connect with the game servers. In such case you will need to unset DNS server and set it again when you will want to play Medal of Honor 2010 If your Project Neptune account has multiple personas, then each time when you log in the last used persona will be selected.

  1. Go to Settings -> Network Settings -> Internet Connection Settings

    1. Select custom setting method
    2. Select a connection method -> Your choice (depending on how you want to connect PS3 to internet)
    3. Select default settings for all settings except DNS Setting. You will need to set DNS manually.
      1. Set Primary DNS to 128.140.0.23
        • DNS Server is hosted by BF2MC Online Community. Huge thanks to them for helping out
        • This DNS server only answers to specific DNS requests, you will need to set a secondary DNS.
      2. Set Secondary DNS to your preference (you can't leave it blank!).
        • 8.8.8.8 (Google DNS)==
        • 1.1.1.1 (Cloudflare DNS)==
        • Other DNS Provider

  2. Update the game if you have not updated it.

  3. Start the game. Create Account pop up should appear after you accept terms of service.

    1. Create Account does not mean create account. This is meant for logging in with an existing account.
    2. Log in with your account. This is only a one time process where your PSN account is linked with Project Neptune account. You will be automatically logged in the next times.

  4. In the main menu go to STORE.

    1. Make sure you have installed Online Pass and Clean Sweep Pack.
    2. It is also recommended to install Hot Zone Pack. If a server is running a DLC map, that you don't have, then you will be stuck in a black loading screen.
    3. If you are not seeing all the downloadable content, please also check for it in the PlayStation store itself. If you are not seeing them there either, you may need to create a new PSN account for a different region (for example, Europe).

  5. Matchmake into a game using PLAY NOW.

    Have fun!

docs.title: How to install or update Punkbuster on PC
docs.text:
1. How to install/upadate Punkbuster:
    1. Download: PBSetup
    2. Download: PBService Installer
  2. Close game to install/update punkbuster.
    1. Launch PBSetup
    2. Click Add a Game
    3. Select Game and their path
    4. Game Path: it detect default path check Examples
  3. If you installed it to different location make sure that end of path of it looks like Medal of Honor\MP
  4. Now process of instaling/updating starts
    1. When it ends close it
    2. Launch PBService Installer
  5. Click Install/Re-Install Punkbuster Service
    1. When it done you need to see Test completed succesfully without error message
    2. Click Finish
  6. You have punkbuster installed/updated

Examples

* Steam: SteamLibrary\steamapps\Medal of Honor\MP
* EA APP: C:\Program Files\EA Games\Medal of Honor\MP

Info

  • Be sure you have closed your game. Sometimes it give errors when it still runs on background. Check with Task Manager for their process. If its not there you can start installing Punkbuster
